title: A Precious Doll Doesn’T Know Love Needs Maintenance From A Boxed Girl
alternative_title: Ai wo Shiranai Aigan Ningyou ni wa Hakoiri Reijou no Oteire ga Hitsuyou desu ;A precious doll that doesn’t know love needs maintenance from a boxed girl; 愛を知らない愛玩人形には箱入り令嬢のお手入れが必要です
status: Ai wo Shiranai Aigan Ningyou ni wa Hakoiri Reijou no Oteire ga Hitsuyou desu ;A precious doll that doesn’t know love needs maintenance from a boxed girl; 愛を知らない愛玩人形には箱入り令嬢のお手入れが必要です
description:
Description :
        Erminia, a boxed girl who lost her father and lived alone, is devoted to working in the territory she inherited. One day a son from a lord from another village much bigger - Cestol, made a proposal to her to buy "Doll". Erminia decides to buy a handsome doll that had a bit of a shady background named Zanni.
What exactly are dolls? A bizzare life of these two has started..
